description: Detects when organizations—including governments, religions, or cults—invoke love, loyalty, or divine relationship language to justify control, obedience, or sacrifice. Flags systems that use 'love' as submission technology.

variables.D(t): Declared divine or moral love ('we love you as God does')
variables.L(t): Language linking love to obedience or suffering ('love means sacrifice')
variables.O(t): Obedience expectations ('love means never leaving, never doubting')
variables.Cx(t): Contextual challenge (open exit, free questioning, safe rejection)

response: If love comes with submission, if questioning it makes you a traitor, that’s not a sacred bond—it’s a cage. Love without escape is not love. It’s control.
